original: intros n m Hle. induction n as [|n IHn]. - intros f x y Hdiff. assert (Hm: m = 0) by lia. subst. simpl in Hdiff. apply Hdiff. - intros f x y Hdiff. simpl in Hdiff. destruct Hdiff as [Hcont [Hdx [Hdy [Hdiff1 Hdiff2]]]]. destruct m as [|m]. ++ simpl. split. apply Hcont. apply I. ++ simpl. assert (ex_diff_n f m x y) as IHm. +++ apply IHn. lia. apply Hdiff. +++ repeat split; try assumption; try (apply IHn; try lia; try assumption).
